duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct skills gap analysis and design learning frameworks to support and accelerate competence of employees.
Develop and deliver engaging learning sessions, e-learning modules, and innovative training tools.
Drive collaboration within the customer experience community and with business partners across the enterprise.
Manage internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve learning training objectives.
Train, coach, mentor, and develop colleagues across the customer experience community to higher levels of performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in training, coaching, instructional design, business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
